com.alexgilleran.icesoap.requester
Interface SOAPRequester

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApacheSOAPRequester
public interface SOAPRequester

Handles SOAP requests

Author:
Alex Gilleran

Method Summary
 InputStream doSoapRequest(SOAPEnvelope envelope, String targetUrl)
          Performs a SOAP request
 InputStream doSoapRequest(SOAPEnvelope envelope, String targetUrl, String soapAction)
          Performs a SOAP request
 void setConnectionTimeout(int timeout)
          Set the timeout for making connections to the server.
 void setSocketTimeout(int timeout)
          Set the timeout for receiving data from the server - note that this takes into account time to establish a connection, send the envelope, wait for the server to process and then recieve it.

doSoapRequest

InputStream doSoapRequest(SOAPEnvelope envelope,
                          String targetUrl,
                          String soapAction)
                          throws SOAPException
Performs a SOAP request

Parameters:
envelope - The SOAP envelope to send
targetUrl - The url of the SOAP web service to communicate with.
soapAction - The SOAP Action to perform - this is put in the SOAPAction field of the outgoing HTTP post.
Returns:
An InputStream representing the
Throws:
IOException
SOAPException

setConnectionTimeout

void setConnectionTimeout(int timeout)
Set the timeout for making connections to the server.

Parameters:
timeout - Timeout time in milliseconds.

setSocketTimeout

void setSocketTimeout(int timeout)
Set the timeout for receiving data from the server - note that this takes into account time to establish a connection, send the envelope, wait for the server to process and then recieve it.

Parameters:
timeout - Timeout time in milliseconds.
